title: Does Oculus Quest need a phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: It does not! The Quest includes within it (for the current price of $399.00 for the base model) A Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 processor4GB of RAM64GB Internal Storage for apps and games1440x1600 resolution per eye3648mAh batteryIntegrated stereo speakers (also has a 3.5mm headphone jack)4 computer vision sensors (on the front corners of the headset, used for inside-out positional tracking)The underlying Oculus OS is actually running on Android 7. The price also includes two controllers (these get tracked by the 4 computer vision sensors. All in all, what you’re getting is something able to reproduce what “desktop” VR was considered back in 2017 and 2018. You’re getting full positional tracking with the headset and controllers, all with an integrated device that needs no phone. It’s an awesome device. I love mine. One of my favorite pieces of hardware of all time, for sure!

Yes , you do need a phone but for only setting up the device and purchasing your games not for actually running the headset if you have any questions regarding the quest you can see my in-depth review on my YouTube channel
